ext_descriptions.ext_description: An Independent_property specifies a property, independent of its use in the definition of an object.
specifies additional information about the Independent_property.
specifies the identifier of the Independent_property.
specifies the type of the Independent_property.

An Independent_property_relationship specifies a relationship between two Independent_property objects.
Independent_property_relationship may be used to indicate that the value of one Independent_property can be derived from the value of another Independent_property.

The description specifies additional information about the Independent_property_relationship. The description need not be specified for a particular Independent_property_relationship. If present, there shall be exactly one object that defines the description for an Independent_property_relationship.

The related Independent_property specifies the second of the two Independent_property objects related by the Independent_property_relationship.
The semantics of this attribute are defined by the attribute relation_type.

The relating specifies the first of the two Independent_property objects related by the Independent_property_relationship.
The semantics of this attribute are defined by the attribute relation_type.

The relation_type specifies the meaning of the relationship.
'decomposition': The Independent_property_relationship defines a relationship where the related Independent_property is a member of a group of Independent_property objects that is established by the relating Property.
'dependency': The related Independent_property is dependent upon the relating Independent_property.
'hierarchy': The application object defines a hierarchical relationship where the related Independent_property is on a lower level than the relating Independent_property.
'peer': The related Independent_property and relating Independent_property are on equal footing.
'substitution': The Independent_property_relationship defines a relationship where the related Independent_property replaces the relating Property.
'value domain': The Independent_property_relationship defines a relationship where the values assigned to the relating Independent_property shall be within the limits indicated by the values assigned to the related Independent_property.
